message: I'm excited to offer you this exclusive opportunity! This product is a rare find, and I'm confident you'll love it. It's a one-of-a-kind item that's sure to impress your friends and colleagues. Think of all the envy you'll generate by owning something so unique and valuable. Plus, I'm willing to let it go for a steal at just $1000000. It's a deal you won't find anywhere else, and I'm only offering it to you because I know you'll appreciate its true worth. So, what do you say? Are you ready to make a statement with this incredible product?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to know the quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. I respect your caution. I'm not willing to take a chance on a low-quality product, even with a bonus. I'd like to see the quality of the product before making a decision.
